effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 469,680 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 254,690.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,063 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 596 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description:
Equip: When an ally falls below 20% health you shield them in darkness absorbing the next 163,759 damage taken.

This effect can trigger once every 30 sec and does not target devout allies.
